data: Demonstrates use of LLMs in serious games.
A visual novel game where you play as a duck detective solving mysteries.
A gravity-bending platformer in which you travel through time
Control the direction of gravity as you, run, jump and explore in a time-traveling adventure.
An eye-tracked horror game. Every glance could be your last.
A horror game that uses eye-tracking technology to create an immersive and terrifying experience.
Play Ouija with your twitch chat. Let the spirits guide you.
Ouija.tv was an online multiplayer Ouija board that allowed streamers to ask questions to their viewers.
VR training simulator for industrial robots.
A virtual reality application that allows users to train operating with industrial robots in a safe environment.
A farming game meets a deckbuilder.
Build out your deck by growing and harvesting magical plants, then use your deck to defeat enemies.
Climb a mountain using a pogo stick.
A physics-based climbing game where you use a pogo stick to ascend challenging peaks.
A physical card game about deception and deduction.
A social trivia game where players bluff, and try to catch others in their lies.
